title: A Closer Look: Pres. Trump's First Solo Press Conference / Interviews: Evan McMullin & Adam Scott
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump's press conference full of false claims, grievances and attacks on the media.
Then, former CIA officer and 2016 presidential candidate Evan McMullin talks to Seth about his concerns about the Trump administration and its ties to Russia, and the necessity of congressional oversight of the executive branch. Backstage, Late Night producer Henry asks him about the role of centrist Republicans in today's politics.
Finally, Adam Scott tells Seth about his kids' obsession with every NBC show except "Parks and Recreation." Late Night producer Kevin asks him about his unique experiences working with Tom Hanks and Billy Joel.
